languages.text: Дверь в отсек и любые идущие в него коммуникации были навсегда заварены и опечатаны поверх. Не раз и не два с этих пор члены команды утверждали, что слышали из-за переборок странные звуки, включая голоса исчезнувших соратников, умолявших выпустить их. Однако более ничего странного вокруг не происходило. Так у корабля появилась своя запретная зона и мрачная легенда.

The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.
languages.original_text: Дверь в отсек и любые идущие в него коммуникации были навсегда заварены и опечатаны поверх. Не раз и не два с этих пор члены команды утверждали, что слышали из-за переборок странные звуки, включая голоса исчезнувших соратников, умолявших выпустить их. Однако более ничего странного вокруг не происходило. Так у корабля появилась своя запретная зона и мрачная легенда.

traits.locale_text: The compartment door was welded shut and sealed. To this day the crew tells stories about weird noises that come from behind the walls, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the weird incidents have stopped. Now the ship has its own forbidden compartment and a scary legend.

Now the ship has its own forbidden compartment and a scary legend.

To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

languages.text: 装着镜子的船舱被焊死了，船舱中所有的支持系统都被封死了。直到今日，船员们还在讲述着船舱中曾传来过古怪的声音，其中包括那些被吸进镜子里的船员，乞求别人把他们放出来的声音。不过，所有古怪的事故都结束了。这艘船有了它自己的绝对禁区，以及属于它自己的可怕传闻。
languages.original_text: The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

traits.locale_text: 装着镜子的船舱被焊死了，船舱中所有的支持系统都被封死了。直到今日，船员们还在讲述着船舱中曾传来过古怪的声音，其中包括那些被吸进镜子里的船员，乞求别人把他们放出来的声音。不过，所有古怪的事故都结束了。这艘船有了它自己的绝对禁区，以及属于它自己的可怕传闻。

languages.text: La puerta del compartimento se soldó y todos sus sistemas de soporte se sellaron. A día de hoy, la tripulación sigue hablando de ruidos extraños a través de las mamparas, incluyendo las voces de sus antiguos camaradas suplicando que les dejen salir. No obstante, los incidentes extraños llegaron a su fin y la nave obtuvo su propia zona restringida y una leyenda oscura.
languages.original_text: The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

traits.locale_text: La puerta del compartimento se soldó y todos sus sistemas de soporte se sellaron. A día de hoy, la tripulación sigue hablando de ruidos extraños a través de las mamparas, incluyendo las voces de sus antiguos camaradas suplicando que les dejen salir. No obstante, los incidentes extraños llegaron a su fin y la nave obtuvo su propia zona restringida y una leyenda oscura.

languages.text: 区画室のドアは溶接で閉じられ、同室につながる全サポートシステムは封鎖された。今日に至るまで、クルーたちは隔壁から聞こえてくる奇妙な音や外に出してくれと懇願する元クルーメイトの声などを語り継いでいる。奇妙な事件は今はなくなったが、船内には制限区域と恐ろしい伝説が残ることとなった。
languages.original_text: The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

traits.locale_text: 区画室のドアは溶接で閉じられ、同室につながる全サポートシステムは封鎖された。今日に至るまで、クルーたちは隔壁から聞こえてくる奇妙な音や外に出してくれと懇願する元クルーメイトの声などを語り継いでいる。奇妙な事件は今はなくなったが、船内には制限区域と恐ろしい伝説が残ることとなった。

languages.text: Die Tür zu dem Modul wurde zugeschweißt und alle Unterstützungssysteme darin wurden ausgeschaltet. Bis zum heutigen Tag erzählt die Crew sich Geschichten von merkwürdigen Geräuschen, die hinter den Schotten zu hören sind, darunter auch die Stimmen ihrer ehemaligen Kameraden, die darum betteln, herausgelassen zu werden. Doch die bizarren Zwischenfälle hörten auf und das Schiff gewann ein neues Sperrgebiet und eine neue düstere Legende.
languages.original_text: The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

traits.locale_text: Die Tür zu dem Modul wurde zugeschweißt und alle Unterstützungssysteme darin wurden ausgeschaltet. Bis zum heutigen Tag erzählt die Crew sich Geschichten von merkwürdigen Geräuschen, die hinter den Schotten zu hören sind, darunter auch die Stimmen ihrer ehemaligen Kameraden, die darum betteln, herausgelassen zu werden. Doch die bizarren Zwischenfälle hörten auf und das Schiff gewann ein neues Sperrgebiet und eine neue düstere Legende.

languages.text: La porte du compartiment a été soudée et tous les systèmes de survie qui y menaient ont été scellés. À ce jour, l'équipage parle de bruits étranges provenant des cloisons, y compris les voix de leurs anciens coéquipiers qui les implorent de les laisser sortir. Mais ces incidents étranges ont pris fin, et le vaisseau a désormais sa propre zone restreinte, ainsi que sa légende sinistre.
languages.original_text: The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.

traits.locale_text: La porte du compartiment a été soudée et tous les systèmes de survie qui y menaient ont été scellés. languages.text: Kompartımanın kapısına kaynak yapılıp mühür basılıyor ve kompartımana giden tüm destek sistemleri kesiliyor. Mürettebat hâlâ daha bölme panellerinden garip sesler geldiğini ve eski tayfaların dışarı çıkmak için yalvardığını anlatmayı sürdürüyor. Neyse ki tuhaf hadiseler sona eriyor ve gemi, bir yasak bölge ve ürkünç bir efsane sahibi oluyor.
languages.original_text: The compartment door was welded shut and all support systems leading to it were sealed off. To this day, the crew tell stories of strange noises coming through the bulkheads, including the voices of their former crewmates begging to be let out. But the bizarre incidents stopped, and the ship gained its own restricted area and a grim legend.
